prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook, a tool in this category, is praised for bridging the gap between technology and people by enabling programming in native languages and making the process accessible to everyone.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, tool, technology, people, programming, native languages, accessible
